item.name: R
item.description: R is a free software environment for statistical computing and graphics.

item.name: RStudio
item.description: RStudio IDE is a powerful and productive user interface for R. Itâ€™s free and open source, and works great on Windows, Mac, and Linux.

item.name: DataCamp
item.description: This website has tutorials for R and Python

item.name: Geany
item.description: Geany is a text editor using the GTK+ toolkit with basic features of an integrated development environment. It was developed to provide a small and fast IDE, which has only a few dependencies from other packages.

item.name: Notepad++
item.description: Notepad++ is a free source code editor and Notepad replacement that supports several languages. Running in the MS Windows environment, its use is governed by GPL License.

item.name: 7-Zip
item.description: 7-Zip is a file archiver with a high compression ratio.

item.name: MiKTeX
item.description: A LaTeX distribution with simple IDE.

item.name: TeXmaker
item.description: Texmaker is a free, modern and cross-platform LaTeX editor for linux, macosx and windows systems that integrates many tools needed to develop documents with LaTeX, in just one application.

item.name: Unix for Windows Tools
item.description: This allows for Unix commands ported to windows.

item.name: OpenSSH
item.description: OpenSSH is the premier connectivity tool for remote login with the SSH protocol.
